title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character in the first line is replaced with spaces, and then ShiftLeft is executed, the text now moves. It is unclear how this behavior is specified, but in the first scenario, it appears that the second line should be shifted left, and the first line should be shifted left at least up to the space character (i.e., removing the tab character). However, it is confusing if there is a stray space because it is not clear why the text won't shift.
